errors.error_description: Incorrect Python version requirement stating Python 2.7 compatibility when the package requires Python 3.8+
correction_candidates: This package requires Python 3.8 or later for compatibility
This package requires Python 3.6 or later for compatibility
This package requires Python 3.10 or later for compatibility
This package supports all Python versions from 3.7+
errors.golden_answer: This package requires Python 3.8 or later for compatibility
